I am a statistician and software developer in the life sciences industry. I specialize in the computational aspects of Bayesian statistics and reproducible research, and I am the creator and maintainer of the [`targets`](https://github.com/wlandau/targets) and [`drake`](https://github.com/ropensci/drake) R packages.
